TypographyProps.name: as
TypographyProps.description: Change the HTML tag. This{' '} prop is from styled-components .WARNING: If using TypeScript, it will not switch types and some props may error. You can add // @ts-expect-error. See{' '} styled-components issue .

TypographyProps.name: children
TypographyProps.description: When children are a string or multiple elements, they will be wrapped by a span. When it is a single element, classnames will be added to it instead

TypographyProps.name: color
TypographyProps.description: Changes font color, can be any of the{' '} HSL Palette css strings

TypographyProps.name: intent
TypographyProps.description: Changes the size of the font

TypographyProps.name: weight
TypographyProps.description: Changes font weight if it is supported in the design system
